title: 이달의소녀탐구 #482 (LOONA TV #482)
summary:
FULL GROUP LTV!!
0:04 -- Bob hair HaSeul looks gorgeous. She says people said they liked it a lot. "But ViVi told me to not laugh like a fool, under this hairstyle. So I am trying to act in a chic way."
0:30 -- Kim Lip: "HaSeul eonnie. Hi." (all with a straight face and then suddenly she laughs). The two have Bob Hair and they are flexing it.
0:45 -- Enter: Purple Haired Choerry. She wants to test it out.
